bike.description: C5 high-modulus carbon, integrated head tube w/ 1 1/2" lower, internal cable routing, oversized PIIS BB86 shell, double water bottle mounts
sizes: S (47cm), S/M (50cm), M (53cm), M/L (55cm), L (58cm), XL (61cm)

components.description: C5 high-modulus carbon thin seatstays, oversized ETC chainstays, forged-alloy dropout w/ replaceable hanger
FC-440 carbon monocoque w/ tapered carbon steerer & carbon dropout
Shimano 105 STI shifter/brake combo, Flight Deck-compatible, 20-speed
Oval 327 aero alloy clincher, 20/24H precision road hubs, stainless bladed spokes
Vittoria Zaffiro Pro Slick, 60 tpi, 700c x 25mm, folding
FSA Orbit C-40, 1 1/8" upper - 1 1/2" lower, integrated
Oval R500 w/ CrMo hollow rails
